Package hr.fer.zemris.java.votingapp.dao

Interface DAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDAO

    public interface DAO
    An interface towards the data persistence API Contains methods that are used to retrive and mofify the data in the database.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic

      • getPoll

        Poll getPoll​(long id)
      throws DAOException
        Returns the Poll under the specified id key.
        Parameters:
        id - - key of the Poll in the database.
        Returns:
        Poll with the specified id
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if the data couldn't be loaded from the database.

      • getPollOptions

        java.util.List<PollOption> getPollOptions​(long pollId,
                                          PollOption.PollOptionOrder order)
                                   throws DAOException
        Returns all PollOption's for a single Poll.
        Parameters:
        pollId - - id of the Poll
        order - - PollOption.PollOptionOrder - by id, descdending or ascending by total votes
        Returns:
        list of available PollOption's for the Poll.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if the options couldn't be loaded from the database.

      • getPollOption

        PollOption getPollOption​(long id)
                  throws DAOException
        Returns the PollOption specified by it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - - id of the poll option
        Returns:
        specified PollOption, if it exists
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if the option couldn+t be loaded from the database.

      • updatePollOptionVotes

        void updatePollOptionVotes​(long id,
                           long votesCount)
        Updates the current number of votes for PollOption.
        Parameters:
        id - - id of the PollOption
        votesCount - - new number of votes to set in the database
